website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a drone that tops the list when it comes to photo and video quality, this model is worth the higher price tag and minor quirks.
pros: Stands out for the Hasselblad camera that produces images with gorgeous color and performs well in low-light settings
cons: Battery life and obstacle avoidance could be better

customer_reviews.title: The best drone I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the Phantom 2, Phantom 3, Phantom 4 Pro, Mavic 1 Pro. Now I own the Mavic 2 Pro. It beats them all. Best Quality for photos I have ever seen. I do more photography then video and this drone does it best. This is my 2nd DJI Mavic 2 Pro. You wont be disappointed with this drone's video and photo quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Best Birthday Gift ever
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his drone!! He does wish the battery life lasted longer (but I just purchased another battery for Christmas, hoping that helps remedy the situation!) . He would also like to zoom in a little more, but other than that loves it so much! We use it for our real estate business and for taking overhead shots of our land.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn D

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing piece of tech. I want to marry this thing. I love it. amazing photo quality. Great build. Great range. Just stunning.
customer_reviews.author: sjmphoto com

customer_reviews.title: A great drone
customer_reviews.text: Amazing drone! This is a feature rich piece of equipment. The camera is amazing. The controls are well laid out and responsive. I am very pleased with the magic pro 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS is the drone you've been waiting for!
customer_reviews.text: If you're interested in lower light images like sunset or sunrise, you'll want to know that the sensor on this camera can handle it well. The MavicPro and the Mavic Zoom cameras have smaller sensors and are TERRIBLE in low light. This drone rocks! By the way, that is my ONLY criticism of those 2 drones, other than the sensor not being what I want, they are also incredible flying cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Davis

customer_reviews.title: A truly excellent drone for videographers and photographers!
customer_reviews.text: I owned the original Mavic Pro and my only complaint was with the camera- The low bitrate 8-bit codec often resulted in ugly artifacts or low detail in certain scenarios. I also wished it had a bigger sensor for improved dynamic range and lower noise. Well, the Mavic 2 Pro addresses those issues and it is an amazing product! Much, much better video quality and improved flying safety features make it the perfect drone for videographers.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Advanced Photo Enthusiasts
customer_reviews.text: This Mavic 2 Pro is a dream. This is my third drone. The first was a piece of plywood junk. The second was a DJI Flame Wheel that was supposed to be indestructible, but I broke parts on it several times, and it had no easy means of attaching a camera. I'm loving the Mavic's Hasselblad camera with its great picture quality and many photo and video capabilities. The drone is very easy to fly, even for a novice like me. It did hit the bare branches of a tree while I was practicing figure 8s, and I had to replace two propellers, so it's not 100% idiot proof, but it's close.
customer_reviews.author: M. Astle

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: The best drone I have own so far. Super small but size does not matter one bit with the DJI Mavic Pro2.
customer_reviews.author: Joey M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent drone
customer_reviews.text: Love this drone. very stable and smart. Can fly like a pro with just a few minutes of practice. Only negative is the battery life and the cost of additional batteries. great picture quality, very smooth filming. Glad i purchased this drone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and control
customer_reviews.text: The best drone ever! Check out my video guys, the manual looks complicated but if you finish reading it and put your hands on the practice, this drone is the best toy ever.
customer_reviews.author: EvaGao

customer_reviews.title: This is one awesome aircraft!
customer_reviews.text: Everything the Mavic pro was, times five. Definitely an excellent upgrade, though the remote could have used a little more attention. Remote: They should’ve used USB-C (like on the smart controller) for the charging port. It has always been a weak point. Also, the camera shutter button doesn’t seem to be as clicky as my other Mavic remotes. It all works fine, just could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: Fell out of the sky for no reason
customer_reviews.text: Really loved this drone until I took out for pictures one day and it fell out of the sky from max flight altitude for no reason. Not sure what happened but I had the sickening feeling of watching my drone drop like a stone while completely unresponsive to the controls. Of course this happened 3 weeks after it went out of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful images and footage in a compact package
customer_reviews.text: I use the Mavic 2 Pro for producing both photos and videos and it surpasses my expectations, especially if you're willing to adjust the final output (using D-LOG for video and RAW for images). For me, the JPEGs are a little too "cooked" and i prefer shooting RAW for best results. Operating the aircraft is very easy and intuitive. Overall, i'm impressed and really glad with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Moreira

customer_reviews.title: Semi Professional Photography Capabilites
customer_reviews.text: Advanced everything. Be prepared to study then do it again if your new to drones. I would not start with this drone $$$ one mistake. Great camera capabilities. Battery life is acceptable. Flight options very good. Great for drone (photo professionals)
customer_reviews.author: B McStarr

customer_reviews.title: wonderful little machine
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drone and the little sucker seems to lives up to all the hipe. Haven't has time to seriously get out and use it. But I did a short test flight in the yard that is surrounded by very tall Oregon timber. It was a little frightening, but I did not crash. We have snow now so I am going to wait and find a very big treeless field to test the Mavic and my drone flying ability.

customer_reviews.title: Breathtaking!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: I used this drone recreationally. And I love it. I was intimidated about flying it at first but the controls are very straightforward. And it’s amazing that you don’t have to worry about flying it back with the return to home functionality. The video quality is amazing for the most part a bit grainy at night. If I where to buy again tho I would buy the zoom. Being able to zoom in would be awesome with this drone.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm VERY impressed with this drone. I can fly it a long way and can easily navigate it back. It also takes amazing photos/videos. I'm still learning how to use it so I can't write a more thorough review but thus far I'm quite happy with this purchase. I would recommend buying an extra battery if you plan to use it for more than a half hour.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, best prosumer drone on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Such an incredible drone! Design, software, image quality all flawless. Best technology I’ve ever laid my hands on. DJI deserves awards for this bird.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product, but DJI support is bad. +1 for ordering through Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: The drone is amazing; it captures the most incredible footage, excellent quality, fairly easy to fly. A remarkable feat of engineering. My DJI support experience was not good — the gimbal was malfunctioning, so after a week I sent it to be repaired. They returned it to me two weeks later without fixing the problem, and didn't reply to my message for another ten days. After contacting Amazon support, they sent a new drone which works perfectly, and took a return of the broken one. So I'm happy I ordered it through Amazon rather than direct with DJI.

customer_reviews.title: Worst Customer Service I have dealt with
customer_reviews.text: I'd love to be able to recommend another drone company right now, but if you can avoid dealing with DJI, do it at all costs. First drone they send me the forward sensors didn't work. It took me a while to realize what the problem was. Second problem was with the camera. I hand launch and catch land my drone, but they are saying it was a crash issue and will not even discuss the issue. Customer service is so bad it makes it not worth the headache. Not sure what other drones are worth looking at, but this will be my last DJI purchase. Can anyone voice an opinion on the Parrot Anafi?

customer_reviews.text: Drone arrived with a defective gyro, unable clear a GYRO0 Data Error message no matter which battery or firmware was installed. IMU calibration performed over a dozen times. product_meta.title: DJI Mavic 2 Pro - Drone Quadcopter UAV with Hasselblad Camera 3-Axis Gimbal HDR 4K Video Adjustable Aperture 20MP 1" CMOS Sensor, up to 48mph, Gray
product_meta.description: Size:Mavic 2 ProDJI Mavic 2 Pro Drone Quadcopter with Hasselblad Camera HDR Video UAV Adjustable Aperture 20MP 1" CMOS Sensor (US Version). Advanced Pilot Assistance Systems (APAS) allows the aircraft to actively avoid obstacles in front of and behind it.
feature_bullets: Equipped with a Hasselblad L1D-20c camera with a 20MP 1” CMOS Sensor, the Mavic 2 camera drone lets you capture gorgeous aerial shots in stunning color detail.
Up to 31 minutes flight time, 44 mph max speed, 907G takeoff weight, 3-axis gimbal for steady shots, 8GB internal storage, SD card Support up to 128 GB
Functions include ActiveTrack 2. 0, Omnidirectional Obstacle Sensing, Hyperlapse, Low-Noise Design, Adjustable Aperture, HDR Photos
The standard remote controller offers up to 135 minutes of battery life on a full charge. Use with the DJI GO 4 App on your smartphone.

What you get: DJI Mavic 2 Pro, Intelligent Flight Battery, Gimbal Protector, Remote Controller, 3x Propellers (Pair), Battery Charger, Power Cable, Communication Cable (USB3. 0 Type-C), USB adapter, Spare Control Sticks (Pair), RC Cable (Lightning Connector), RC Cable (Standard Micro USB Connector), RC Cable (USB Type-C Connector)

DJI GO 4 App requires iOS 10.0.2, Android 5.0 or above.
